titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Philip H. Chadbourn papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Beth Goder

publicationstmt.p: Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-06-11T08:52-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Letters, reports, pamphlets, photographs, clippings, and memorabilia related to the Commission for Relief in Belgium.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Philip H. Chadbourn papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1963.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Collections
relatedmaterial.p: Commission for Relief in Belgium records, Hoover Institution Archives
Vernon Lyman Kellogg papers, Hoover Institution Archives
Charlotte Hoffman Kellogg papers, Hoover Institution Archives
United States Food Administration records, Hoover Institution Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Philip H. Chadbourn was the Charleville-Mézières delegate for the Commission for Relief in Belgium during World War I.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The papers document Philip H. Chadbourn's work for the Commission for Relief in Belgium through letters, reports, pamphlets, photographs, drawings, clippings, and memorabilia.

The collection contains clippings concerning the activities of the Commission for Relief in Belgium, including articles written by Chadbourn and a press release describing exhibits he presented to President Wilson at the White House. Many clippings discuss the activities of Vernon Kellogg. The correspondence includes copies of letters from Herbert Hoover to others that were forwarded to Chadbourn.

Illustrated thank you cards made by children can be found in the collection, along with an album of portraits drawn by H. Lemaine and additional drawings. The photographs include an image of a girl wearing a flower sack and a small photo album labeled "souvenir de la fête américaine."
The collection includes several documents of William H. Chadbourn, including correspondence and a certificate.

did.unittitle: Correspondence, writings, photographs, drawings, booklets, clippings, and press releases related to the Commission for Relief in Belgium. Papers of William Chadbourn. Directory of Hoover Overseas and War Service Organizations. Ougree Commune in Belgium volume of charitable organizations.
Food coupons and coupon books, illustrated thank you cards, and miscellaneous artifacts
Album of portraits by H. Lemaine, flyers, cloth artifact, and drawings
